version_description: We have improved syncing between devices to be even more reliable. We also fixed various bugs and improve the app performance so it is a lot smoother when you type a note. If you have any feedback or suggestion, please write to us at support@getupnote.com, we love to hear from you!
We have improved the app to be more stable and faster.
- Improve dark theme and make the editor to be more reliable
- Fix an issue with keyboard is dismissed when switch to Emoji.
- When navigating to a saved search, the keywords now will be automatically highlighted
- Various small improvements to make UpNote even more pleasant and stable
